mapper.sql: sale_order_Id, sale_order_time, customer, salesmen, receivables, remarks, approver, found_time, update_time, approval_time, approval_state, delivery_state, order_state, delivery_time, advance
mapper.select: select a.*,b.* from sale_order a INNER JOIN base_customer b on a.customer=b.customer_number where order_id = #{orderId}
select s.*,c.customer_name,u.u_name from sale_order s inner join base_customer c on c.customer_number=s.customer inner join sys_user u on u.u_id=s.approver
mapper.insert: insert into sale_order (sale_order_id,sale_order_time, customer, salesmen, receivables, remarks, approver, found_time, update_time, approval_time, approval_state, delivery_state, order_state, delivery_time, advance) values (#{saleOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{saleOrderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesmen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivables,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approvalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approvalState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{advance,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update sale_order
sale_order_time = #{saleOrderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
customer = #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salesmen = #{salesmen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receivables = #{receivables,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approver = #{approver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
found_time = #{foundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approval_time = #{approvalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approval_state = #{approvalState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delivery_state = #{deliveryState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
advance = #{advance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where sale_order_Id = #{saleOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sale_order set sale_order_time = #{saleOrderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, customer = #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salesmen = #{salesmen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receivables = #{receivables,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approver = #{approver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, found_time = #{foundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approval_time = #{approvalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approval_state = #{approvalState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivery_state = #{deliveryState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, advance = #{advance,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where sale_order_Id = #{saleOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sale_order
sale_order_time = #{saleOrderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
customer = #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salesmen = #{salesmen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receivables = #{receivables,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

approval_state = #{approvalState,jdbcType=INTEGER},

order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
advance = #{advance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where sale_order_Id = #{saleOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sale_order
update_time = #{updateTime},
advance =advance + #{advance},
where sale_order_id = #{saleOrderId}
